name: Valerya McGRIFF, Petitioner v. STATE CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (Department of Public Welfare), Respondent
name_abbreviation: McGriff v. State Civil Service Commission

parties: Valerya McGRIFF, Petitioner v. STATE CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (Department of Public Welfare), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2013, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
78 A.3d 1069
Valerya McGRIFF, Petitioner v. STATE CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION (Department of Public Welfare), Respondent.
No. 123 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 30, 2013.
